system.description: Your eyes are able to discern colors and light patterns that most humanoids cannot see, granting you improved sight. You can see invisible creatures and objects and gain darkvision to 60 feet. If you already have darkvision, it increases by 60 feet. Additionally, you have advantage on ability checks to recognize or see through visual illusory effects within 30 feet, such as @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.eceeym81z9dq6r58]{Major Image} or @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.4oruofw2q7gso9hq]{Minor Illusion}, as well as on saving throws against spells or effects that utilize visual illusions, such as the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.crjcunjc1r21w2mv]{Fear} spell.
